description: Exceeded maximum number of HTTP redirects. Infinite redirect loop or misconfigured server.
solutions: Increase max redirect limit if legitimate
Use direct URL if redirects unnecessary
prevention: Use canonical URLs to avoid redirects
examples: class RedirectInterceptor : Interceptor { private val visited = mutableSetOf<String>(); override fun intercept(chain: Chain): Response { if (chain.request().url.toString() in visited) throw TooManyRedirectsException(); visited.add(chain.request().url.toString()); return chain.proceed(chain.request()) } }
